program_brief: Already a developer? Step into the Agentic world. Embed AI. Build Agents. Lead Agentic AI.

rtb_content.rtb_title: ##### Designed for Developers to 'Build with AI'
rtbs: - For engineers with Java, C#, or JS experience.
- Bridge on Python for AI-Embedded Applications.
- Build agents that act and run tasks independently.
- Designed around real RAG and Agent developer roles.
- Spend 60% or more doing hands-on work.
- Day 1 ready path: Connect LLMs → Embed AI → Build Agents → Agentic AI.

rtb_content.rtb_title: ##### Modern Stack for Real-World AI Systems
rtbs: - Python, FastAPI, Pydantic, and OpenAPI for clean APIs.
- LangChain, LangGraph, CrewAI, and LlamaIndex for agents and RAG.
- LangFuse (or similar) for tracing and evaluations.
- Start by embedding AI into existing applications.
- Then build agentic workflows that plan, act, and self-check.
- Learn safe prompting, RAG grounding, and simple guardrails.
- Live, online mentor-led sessions with self-paced practice.
- Interactive 'watch and repeat' demos.
- Mentors invested in your success.
- Complete 80+ assignments, 4 projects, and a capstone.
- Build AI-powered APIs, chatbots, RAG systems, and agent workflows.
- Present results with logs, evaluations, and a simple runbook.
- Ship small, usable AI features every sprint.
- Showcase: AI-embedded feature, RAG app, and agent workflow.
- Concise 'readme + demo' portfolio recruiters can review.
- Portfolio designed for recruiter review.
- 'Tell the story' prompts for each project.
- Map projects to real job roles: AI App Dev, GenAI Integrator, LLM Engineer.

project_content.project_brief: ## Learners apply their AI engineering skills to build, test, and deploy intelligent systems that mirror real-world use cases — from conversational agents to multi-agent workflows. Each project reinforces practical design, development, and deployment experience with measurable outcomes.

projects.project_title: Wellbeing Coach for Personalized 5-Minute Mental Booster
projects.brief_description: Build an AI-powered wellbeing coach that improves user mood.
projects.detailed_description: Design a mood-aware AI wellbeing coach that senses user mood and location, then recommends a 5-minute activity—like breathing, stretching, or journaling—to boost emotional wellness instantly.
projects.core_features: Detect user mood and context,Recommend personalized micro-activities,Deploy API-based AI interaction,Track wellbeing engagement data

projects.project_title: Team Coding Standards and Guidelines Q&A Agent
projects.brief_description: Build a no-code agent to answer coding guideline queries.
projects.detailed_description: Create an internal Q&A agent that helps developers follow team coding standards using a no-code AI platform. The agent retrieves answers and examples based on pre-defined rules and team guidelines.
projects.core_features: Parse developer queries,Retrieve coding rules and examples,Respond with consistent guidance,Integrate into developer workflow

projects.brief_description: Design an AI agent for personalized travel itineraries.
projects.detailed_description: Develop an AI-powered trip planning agent that generates custom itineraries based on user preferences, optimizing routes, budgets, and activities through real-time AI-driven recommendations.
projects.core_features: Gather user inputs and preferences,Generate optimized travel plans,Integrate live data APIs,Provide interactive user interface

projects.brief_description: Create an AI agent that recommends jobs and resume improvements.
projects.detailed_description: Build a conversational AI agent that collects user details or resume data, finds relevant live job openings, and suggests targeted resume and cover letter improvements using AI recommendations.
projects.core_features: Parse resume or profile info,Fetch and analyze job listings,Generate resume and cover letter feedback,Deploy via conversational UI

projects.brief_description: Develop an AI agent that answers customer car-related queries.
projects.detailed_description: Build an AI-powered car advisory agent that retrieves and presents details such as models, pricing, and availability using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to ensure factual accuracy.
projects.core_features: Query company database via RAG,Answer pricing and feature queries,Ensure context-aware responses,Deploy securely on cloud

projects.brief_description: Design an AI assistant for personalized investment advice.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a financial advisory AI that gathers user goals, risk preferences, and investment horizons, and uses RAG to provide tailored savings and investment recommendations.
projects.core_features: Capture user goals and preferences,Retrieve and summarize financial data,Provide safe investment suggestions,Ensure responsible AI interaction

projects.project_title: Multi-Model RAG System for Internal FAQs
projects.brief_description: Develop a RAG system integrating text and image data.
projects.detailed_description: Create a multimodal retrieval-augmented system that uses both text and images to answer internal organizational FAQs, enhancing information access and operational efficiency.
projects.core_features: Index text and image content,Perform hybrid retrieval and reranking,Generate accurate, multimodal answers,Secure internal knowledge access

projects.brief_description: Build a RAG-powered assistant for faster support ticket resolution.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a support agent that retrieves solutions from ticket histories, troubleshooting guides, and SQL logs using RAG to improve customer response time and quality.
projects.core_features: Ingest ticket and support data,Retrieve relevant troubleshooting content,Maintain customer data privacy,Automate tier-1 support

projects.project_title: Multi-Agent System for Code Review & Optimization
projects.brief_description: Develop Crew Agents to automate code review and feedback.
projects.detailed_description: Build a multi-agent workflow using CrewAI to review and optimize code. Agents evaluate code quality, detect issues, and propose targeted improvements in performance and structure.
projects.core_features: Orchestrate multiple agents for code analysis,Automate code quality evaluation,Provide feedback and improvement suggestions,Integrate with CI/CD pipeline

projects.project_title: Multi-Agent Software Customer Support with Human in the Loop
projects.brief_description: Implement an agent hierarchy for support and escalation.
projects.detailed_description: Create a multi-agent support system with specialized roles—Support Specialist and QA—handling customer FAQs, while delegating complex queries to human operators for validation.
projects.core_features: Design agent hierarchy for tiered support,Implement human-in-loop escalation,Ensure secure and traceable workflows,Automate routine support interactions

projects.brief_description: Develop multi-role agents to assess candidates collaboratively.
projects.detailed_description: Build an agentic system where AI roles such as Hiring Manager, SME, and Behavioral Analyst collaboratively conduct structured candidate assessments, generating detailed reports and insights.
projects.core_features: Assign specialized agent roles for evaluation,Coordinate multi-agent workflows,Generate candidate assessment reports,Ensure fairness and transparency
